messages.original_text:

Konnichiwa 🥷

gpt-image-2 soon? 👀

messages.original_text:
ICYMI: According to Sam Altman, OpenAI’s hardware is expected to be released within the next 2 years timeframe. 

“Altman describes OpenAI’s forthcoming AI device as more peaceful and calm than the iPhone”
messages.translated_text:
Just nak bagitau: Sam Altman ada cakap, diorang jangka hardware OpenAI akan keluar dalam masa 2 tahun lagi.

"Altman kata alat AI OpenAI yang akan datang ni lebih tenang dan aman berbanding iPhone"

messages.original_text:
Claude Opus 4.5 claims top 2 spots on web dev arena and top 3 on text arena after Gemini 3 Pro and Grok 4.1 models. 

Will Grok secure top 2 until the end of the year on text?
messages.translated_text:
Claude Opus 4.5 menduduki dua tempat teratas dalam arena pembangunan web dan tempat ketiga dalam arena teks, selepas model Gemini 3 Pro dan Grok 4.1.

Agak-agak Grok kekal di tempat kedua teratas dalam arena teks sampai hujung tahun ni?

messages.original_text:
Perplexity released a Memory upgrade, which allows Comet to pull context from active projects, open tabs, and more sources!

Supermemory 🤖
messages.translated_text:
Perplexity dah keluarkan Memory upgrade, tau! Benda ni bagi Comet tarik konteks dari projek yang tengah aktif, tab yang terbuka, dan macam-macam sumber lagi.

Supermemory 🤖

messages.original_text:
Perplexity announced the "Virtual Try On" feature powered by Nano Banana! 

It allows you to generate your avatar on Perplexity, which you can use to try out clothes before making a purchase. 

This is a huge market btw 👀
messages.translated_text:
Perplexity baru je umumkan ciri baru, "Virtual Try On" yang guna teknologi Nano Banana!

Dengan ciri ni, kau boleh buat avatar kau sendiri kat Perplexity, lepas tu boleh guna avatar tu untuk try baju sebelum beli.

Gempak jugak Update Pasaran ni 👀

messages.original_text:
Google is working on an image annotation feature for Gemini. Users will be able to draw and add text to generated images before downloading them. 

"Generate me a coloring page" 🍌
messages.translated_text:
Google tengah usahakan satu ciri baru untuk Gemini, iaitu pengguna boleh conteng dan tambah teks kat gambar yang dijana sebelum di muat turun.

"Jana untuk saya satu muka surat mewarna" 🍌

messages.original_text:
Moonshot is working on Memory and Personalisation support for Kimi. 

"Kimi remembers your preferences from past chats to better tailor future responses."

Moonshine? 👀
messages.translated_text:
Moonshot tengah usahakan sokongan Memory dan Personalisation untuk Kimi.

"Kimi ingat pilihan kau dari chat sebelum ni, jadi dia boleh bagi jawapan yang lebih sesuai lepas ni."

Moonshine? 👀

messages.original_text: Google is working on publicly shareable canvas nodes for Stitch so you can share only a selected generation rather than the whole project.
messages.translated_text: Okay, Google tengah usahakan sesuatu untuk Stitch. Nanti kita boleh kongsi canvas nodes secara public. Jadi, kita boleh pilih generasi mana yang kita nak kongsi, tak payah kongsi keseluruhan projek.

messages.original_text: Kimi released Slides feature, powered by Nano Banana Pro, and it is available for free during the next 48 hours!
messages.translated_text: Kimi dah keluarkan ciri Slides, guna Nano Banana Pro, dan percuma untuk 48 jam akan datang ni!

messages.original_text:
Google is working on Scheduled tasks for Jules SWE Agent and preparing "Proactive Mode" for the release.

Proactive mode was teased earlier and will enable Jules to proactively scan the codebase and fix bugs.
messages.translated_text:
Okay, Google tengah usahakan fungsi tugasan berjadual untuk Jules SWE Agent dan diorang tengah siapkan "Proactive Mode" untuk dikeluarkan nanti.

"Proactive Mode" ni dah diusik-usik sikit sebelum ni, dan fungsi ni akan membolehkan Jules untuk imbas kod dan betulkan pepijat secara proaktif.

messages.original_text:
[**Google to add scheduled jobs and proactive mode to Jules Agent**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/google-to-add-scheduled-jobs-and-proactive-mode-to-jules-agent/)

Google is expanding Jules with scheduled task automation and a proactive mode for code monitoring, allowing autonomous project upkeep and recurring analyses, aiming to support large engineering teams through persistent memory-based workflows.

🗞 #jules
messages.translated_text:
Google nak tambah fungsi kerja berjadual dan mod proaktif kat Jules Agent diorang.

Kiranya, Jules ni nanti boleh automatik buat kerja-kerja yang dah ditetapkan dan pantau kod projek. Senanglah nak maintain projek dan buat analisis berulang. Diorang buat ni sebab nak tolong team engineering yang besar, supaya kerja lebih lancar dengan sistem memori yang berterusan.

🗞 #jules

messages.original_text:
BREAKING 🚨: OpenAI is planning to start testing ads on ChatGPT soon, as new ad related strings appeared in the latest build for Android. 

Likely it will be limited to search ads only. Highly possible that it is powered by the same infrastructure as Bing ads?

Credits: Tibor
messages.translated_text:
Berita penting 🚨: OpenAI macam nak mula uji iklan kat ChatGPT tak lama lagi. Ada kod baru pasal iklan muncul dalam versi Android terbaru.

Kemungkinan besar iklan carian je. Besar kemungkinan guna sistem yang sama macam iklan Bing, kot?

Kredit: Tibor

messages.original_text:
Google is working on Gemini UI revamp as well as on the standalone macOS application. 

Extremely needed 🔥
messages.translated_text:
Google tengah usahakan perubahan pada UI Gemini, dan juga aplikasi macOS yang berasingan.

Memang diperlukan sangat 🔥

messages.original_text:
Microsoft keeps working on a Career Coach experiment for Copilot. It seems users will speak face-to-face with an AI avatar that asks 6 interview questions. 

You will be able to record your own camera footage to see later how you are performing. 

AI hiring AI soon? 👀
messages.translated_text:
Microsoft tengah usahakan satu projek Career Coach untuk Copilot. Nampak gaya macam pengguna akan berdepan dengan avatar AI yang tanya 6 soalan temuduga.

Nanti boleh rakam video sendiri untuk tengok balik macam mana kita jawab.

AI ambil pekerja guna AI, tak lama lagi? 👀

[**OpenAI plants testing ads in ChatGPT Android app**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/openai-plants-testing-ads-in-chatgpt-android-app/)

OpenAI is preparing to introduce ads in its ChatGPT Android app, with code in the latest beta referencing “search ads” and “bazaar content,” suggesting commercial displays in shopping and recommendation contexts for free users.

🗞 #chatgpt

**OpenAI mula uji iklan dalam app ChatGPT Android** (SUMBER: 0)

OpenAI tengah bersiap sedia nak masukkan iklan dalam app ChatGPT Android diorang. Dalam versi beta terbaru, ada kod yang sebut pasal "search ads" (iklan carian) dan "bazaar content" (kandungan bazar). Macam nak tunjuk iklan komersial kat pengguna percuma masa diorang shopping atau cari cadangan.

🗞 #chatgpt

Don't forget to claim your 1 month of free ChatGPT Plus subscription. If you try to cancel, ChatGPT will offer you a month off if you keep it. 

Also, don't miss today's weekly Newsletter with 16 months of free subs and 5000 free credits across 7 tools in total!

 Claim them 👀

Jangan lupa claim langganan ChatGPT Plus percuma selama sebulan. Kalau kau cuba nak batalkan, ChatGPT mungkin akan bagi kau sebulan percuma kalau kau teruskan langganan tu.

Jangan terlepas juga Newsletter mingguan hari ni! Ada 16 bulan langganan percuma dan 5000 kredit percuma untuk 7 tools semuanya!

Claim sekarang 👀

AI features on Telegram soon!

Tak lama lagi ada ciri-ciri AI kat Telegram!

Launch week 👀

Minggu pelancaran ni... 👀

AI video week 🔥

Kling AI dah keluarkan model Kling O1 dengan pemahaman multimodal. Maksudnya, dia boleh faham input dari teks, gambar, dan video sekaligus!

A new top 1 👀

Besides that a new Discover feed is being tested on iOS. Users will see Perplexity pages from Discover directly on the home page. 

* Not available to the public yet

messages.original_text:
[**Runway unveils Gen-4.5 video generation model that tops Video Arena**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/runway-unveils-gen-4-5-video-generation-model-that-tops-video-arena/)

Runway introduces Gen-4.5, a video generation model offering high visual fidelity, precise motion, and creative control. It outperforms peers on benchmarking, supports global access, and builds on prior models with technical upgrades and GPU optimization.

🗞 #runway

Runway baru je keluarkan Gen-4.5, model baru untuk buat video. Model ni memang cun sebab kualiti gambar dia tinggi, gerakan pun tepat, dan kita boleh kawal kreativiti kita. Dia lagi power dari model lain bila diuji. Semua orang boleh guna dan dia upgrade dari model lama dengan penambahbaikan teknikal dan GPU.

🗞 #runway

Sekarang ni, Cameos cuma boleh dibuat dan diedit kat telefon je.

messages.original_text:
[**Mistral AI released Mistral 3 Large and Ministral 3 under Apache 2.0**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/mistral-ai-released-mistral-3-large-and-ministral-3-under-apache-2-0/)

Mistral AI has released the Mistral 3 model family, including compact models and the 41B-parameter Mistral Large 3. All are open source under Apache 2.0, optimized for efficiency, and available across multiple major AI platforms.

🗞 #mistral
messages.translated_text:
Okay, dengar sini. Mistral AI dah keluarkan Mistral 3 Large dan Ministral 3, tau? Semuanya di bawah lesen Apache 2.0.

Mistral AI dah lancarkan model Mistral 3, termasuk model yang lebih kecil dan Mistral Large 3 dengan 41 bilion parameter. Semuanya sumber terbuka di bawah Apache 2.0, dioptimumkan untuk efisien, dan boleh didapati di banyak platform AI yang besar.

🗞 #mistral
SUMBER: 0

messages.original_text:
[**Perplexity releases BrowseSafe-Benchmark for browser AI Agents**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/perplexity-releases-browsesafe-benchmark-for-browser-ai-agents/)

Perplexity released BrowseSafe-Bench, a public benchmark and detection model targeting prompt injection and adversarial threats in browser-based AI agents, offering strong real-time performance and fostering research collaboration in web agent security.

🗞 #perplexity
messages.translated_text:
**Perplexity Lancarkan BrowseSafe-Benchmark untuk Ejen AI Pelayar** (SUMBER: 0)

Perplexity dah keluarkan BrowseSafe-Bench, satu penanda aras awam dan model pengesanan yang fokus pada suntikan prompt dan ancaman dalam ejen AI berasaskan pelayar. Benda ni bagi prestasi masa nyata yang bagus dan galakkan kerjasama penyelidikan dalam keselamatan ejen web.

🗞 #perplexity

SUMBER: 0 https://www.testingcatalog.com/perplexity-releases-browsesafe-benchmark-for-browser-ai-agents/

messages.original_text:
[**OpenAI tests Memory Search as GPT-5.2 launch rumors grow**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/openai-tests-memory-search-as-gpt-5-2-launch-rumors-grow/)

OpenAI is testing a “Memory search” feature in ChatGPT, enabling users to query stored data directly, addressing challenges with large memory sets. The move likely responds to rising competition and hints at a broader update strategy.

🗞 #chatgpt
messages.translated_text:
**OpenAI Uji Ciri Carian Memori, Gosip Pelancaran GPT-5.2 Semakin Kencang** (SUMBER: 0)

OpenAI tengah uji ciri "Carian Memori" dalam ChatGPT. Ciri ni bagi pengguna cari data yang disimpan terus, jadi senang nak urus memori yang besar. Mungkin sebab persaingan makin sengit, dan ini macam petanda ada update yang lebih besar akan datang.

🗞 #chatgpt

messages.original_text:
[**Kling AI is about to release new Video 2.6 model with native audio**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/kling-ai-is-about-to-release-new-video-2-6-model-with-native-audio/)

Kling 2.6 introduces native audio generation, integrating dialogue, singing, and effects directly into video output. This update strengthens its multimodal capabilities and positions it competitively against leading AI video platforms.

🗞 #kling
messages.translated_text:
Okay, ni nak cerita sikit. Kling AI akan keluarkan model Video 2.6 yang baru, siap dengan audio sekali.

Kling 2.6 ni boleh hasilkan audio terus, macam dialog, nyanyian, dan efek bunyi, semua dalam video. Update ni memang power sebab dia jadi lagi serba boleh dan boleh lawan dengan platform video AI yang lain.

🗞 #kling
SUMBER: 0

GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is now available via the Responses API and OpenAI Platform. 

"GPT‑5.1-Codex-Max is purpose-built for agentic coding. foundational reasoning model."
messages.translated_text:
GPT-5.1-Codex-Max dah boleh guna melalui Responses API dan OpenAI Platform.

"GPT‑5.1-Codex-Max memang dibuat khas untuk coding agentic. Model penaakulan asas."

BREAKING 🚨: Gemini 3 Deep Think is rolling out to Ultra subscribers on Gemini! 

The big one 👀

Yang ni memang gempak 👀

messages.original_text:
OpenAI is preparing to launch its upcoming App Directory soon, as a new "Apps" call-to-action widget appears in the settings for some users. 

It is not functional yet and leads to the /apps url. 

Next week? 👀

OpenAI tengah bersiap sedia nak lancarkan App Directory diorang tak lama lagi. Ada widget "Apps" baru dah muncul kat bahagian settings untuk sesetengah pengguna.

Tapi, belum boleh guna lagi. Bila klik, dia pergi ke URL /apps.

Minggu depan kot? 👀

messages.original_text: NotebookLM chat customisation feature got a huge boost with an expanded character limit from 500 to 10k. Users now can utilise much more detailed prompts.
messages.translated_text: Okay, gini cerita dia. NotebookLM punya ciri sembang dah upgrade gila-gila! Had aksara dia dah naik dari 500 ke 10,000. Sekarang, pengguna boleh guna arahan yang lagi detail.

messages.original_text:
Half of the internet is down again due to the ongoing Cloudflare incident. 

"Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related API
messages.translated_text:
Okay, separuh internet macam down lagi sebab ada masalah dengan Cloudflare.

"Cloudflare tengah siasat masalah dengan Cloudflare Dashboard dan API diorang. SUMBER: 0

messages.original_text:
[**NotebookLM to get new model selector with Gemini 3 Pro**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/notebooklm-to-get-new-model-selector-with-gemini-3-pro/)

NotebookLM introduces a model selector for switching between AI models, raises custom instruction limits to 10,000 characters, and begins rolling out features like infographic and slide deck generation on iOS to support complex content creation.

🗞 #notebooklm
messages.translated_text:
**NotebookLM Akan Dapat Pemilih Model Baru dengan Gemini 3 Pro** (SUMBER: 0)

NotebookLM memperkenalkan pemilih model untuk bertukar antara model AI, menaikkan had arahan tersuai kepada 10,000 aksara, dan mula melancarkan ciri seperti penjanaan infografik dan slaid dek pada iOS untuk menyokong penciptaan kandungan yang kompleks.

🗞 #notebooklm

messages.original_text:
[**Google plans to integrate Opal Agent builder into Gemini**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/google-plans-to-integrate-opal-agent-builder-into-gemini/)

A new banner in Gemini hints at a potential integration of Opal, Google’s agent-powered workflow tool, suggesting broader automation capabilities ahead. With multiple tools evolving in parallel, Google’s platform strategy remains uncertain.

🗞 #gemini
messages.translated_text:
Google macam nak masukkan Opal Agent builder dalam Gemini, tau tak?

Nampak macam ada banner baru kat Gemini yang bagi hint pasal ni. Opal tu alat Google yang guna agent untuk mudahkan kerja. Kalau betul, maksudnya Gemini nanti lagi power bab automasi. Tapi, dengan macam-macam alat yang Google tengah buat ni, tak berapa jelas lagi strategi platform diorang.

🗞 #gemini

SUMBER: 0

messages.original_text:
BREAKING 🚨: Google is working on a "Live Translation" feature for Gemini on the web. 

"Share screen for live translation"

Gemini 3 Pro Native Audio & Video model soon? 👀
messages.translated_text:
Berita penting 🚨: Google tengah usahakan ciri "Terjemahan Langsung" untuk Gemini kat web.

"Kongsi skrin untuk terjemahan langsung"

Model Audio & Video Asli Gemini 3 Pro bakal keluar tak lama lagi ke? 👀

messages.original_text:
Ah, no - this is just an ad 💀

"Try Opal from Google Labs"
messages.translated_text:
Ah, takde lah - ni iklan je 💀

"Cuba Opal dari Google Labs"

messages.original_text:
It turns out that Grok 4.20 is being tested on Alpha Arena as a "mystery model" and shows quite significant performance. 

"Undisclosed frontier AI lab (not Nof1)" 👀

How much would you pay for a model with such performance to run your portfolio?
messages.translated_text:
Okay, rupanya Grok 4.20 tengah diuji kat Alpha Arena sebagai "model misteri" dan nampak macam prestasi dia agak bagus.

"Makmal AI canggih yang tak didedahkan (bukan Nof1)" 👀

Agak-agak berapa korang sanggup bayar untuk model yang macam ni untuk uruskan portfolio korang?

messages.original_text:
Looks like Perplexity is recommending individual news publishers on their Discover feed for mobile. 

On the web, all “pages” appear as aggregated and on mobile it is a mix of aggregated and publisher-specific posts. 

Perplexity for News 👀
messages.translated_text:
Nampaknya Perplexity tengah rekomen penerbit berita individu kat Discover feed diorang untuk mobile.

Kat web, semua "pages" nampak macam dikumpulkan, tapi kat mobile, dia campuran antara yang dikumpulkan dengan post dari penerbit tertentu.

Perplexity untuk Berita 👀

messages.original_text:

RedGPT 🤖
messages.translated_text:
Berita terkini 🚨: OpenAI mungkin akan keluarkan GPT-5.2 seawal 9 Disember ni, menurut The Verge.

Slide Decks and Infographics are now available on NotebookLM for mobile. 

Now you can generate your content on the go from anywhere.

Sekarang ni, kau boleh hasilkan kandungan kau kat mana-mana je.

And yes, this is possibly an image-2 A/B test 👀

messages.original_text: Completed Anthropic Interviewer questions 🤖

messages.original_text:
BREAKING 🚨: Meta acquired AI-wearables startup Limitless!

Personal AI assistants will be everywhere in several years. Meta is probably the only company that can quickly bring them to a big market with their smart glasses.
messages.translated_text:
Berita penting 🚨: Meta dah beli startup AI boleh pakai, Limitless!

Pembantu AI peribadi akan ada di mana-mana dalam beberapa tahun lagi. Meta mungkin satu-satunya syarikat yang boleh bawa benda ni ke pasaran besar dengan cepat, guna cermin mata pintar diorang.

messages.original_text:
Poetiq system achieved 54% score on ARC-AGI-2 benchmark, surpassing Gemini 3 Deep Think at more then twice lower compute cost. 

Poetiq (Mix) is a combined self learning system that leverages Gemini 3 and GPT-5.1 models. 

We need to do SVG tests 👀
messages.translated_text:
Sistem Poetiq dah capai skor 54% kat ujian ARC-AGI-2, lagi tinggi dari Gemini 3 Deep Think, tapi dengan kos pengiraan yang lebih rendah dari dua kali ganda.

Poetiq (Mix) ni sistem pembelajaran kendiri gabungan yang guna model Gemini 3 dan GPT-5.1.

Kita kena buat ujian SVG ni. 👀

messages.original_text:
[**Microsoft prepares GPT-5.1, Reminders and Projects for Copilot**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/microsoft-prepares-gpt-5-1-reminders-and-projects-for-copilot/)

Microsoft is upgrading Copilot with GPT-5.1, making Smart mode the default for complex queries. New features like 3D model remixing, Reminders, and Projects aim to position Copilot as a fuller productivity tool.

🗞 #microsoftcopilot

[**Google prepares Gemini Live with screen sharing for desktop web**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/google-prepares-gemini-live-with-screen-sharing-for-desktop-web/)

Google is preparing to bring Gemini Live to desktop, expanding real-time voice, screen, and video support beyond mobile. The move aligns with its cross-platform unification strategy, benefiting productivity and language-related use cases.

🗞 #gemini

Grok 4.2 is planned to arrive in 3 or 4 Elon weeks. This release needs to be special. 

Soon 👀

[**Exclusive: Google set to launch Gemini Nano Banana 2 Flash**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/exclusive-google-set-to-launch-gemini-nano-banana-2-flash/)

Google is preparing to launch the Nano Banana 2 Flash model within the Gemini ecosystem, offering performance on par with the Pro version but at lower cost, targeting broader deployment for cost-sensitive or large-scale use cases.

🗞 #gemini

BREAKING 🚨: Google is planning to release Nano Banana 2 Flash in the coming weeks, as a new “Mayo” announcement has been added to Gemini web. 

According to tests, Nano Banana 2 Flash delivers almost the same quality as Pro at a lower price. 

Mayo or Ketchup? 🌭

Z AI released GLM-4.6V (106B) and GLM-4.6V-Flash (9B) open models! Both are available on Z AI Chat and APIs. 

Coding evals 👀

BREAKING 🚨: Google released Scheduled Tasks and Suggestions in Beta on Jules SWE Agent, where it can proactively propose improvements to your repository. 

The whole UI got redesigned as well 🤩
messages.translated_text:
BERITA TERKINI 🚨: Google dah keluarkan Tugasan Berjadual dan Cadangan dalam versi Beta pada Jules SWE Agent. Dengan ini, ia boleh secara proaktif cadangkan penambahbaikan untuk repositori anda.

Seluruh UI pun dah direka semula juga 🤩

messages.original_text:
ChatGPT users are now able to use Adobe Photoshop, Express, and Acrobat for free.

ChatGPT Apps are expanding 👀
messages.translated_text:
Pengguna ChatGPT kini boleh guna Adobe Photoshop, Express, dan Acrobat secara percuma.

Aplikasi ChatGPT semakin berkembang 👀

messages.original_text:
Perplexity is working on a TODOs support for its Comet browser! It will be a small feature, but with huge potential if Perplexity Assistant can create, manage and execute these tasks. 

* Not available to the users yet 👀
messages.translated_text:
Perplexity sedang usahakan sokongan TODOs untuk pelayar Comet mereka! Ia akan jadi ciri kecil, tapi dengan potensi besar kalau Perplexity Assistant boleh cipta, urus, dan laksanakan tugasan-tugasan ni.

* Belum tersedia untuk pengguna lagi 👀

messages.original_text:
[**Google launches fully managed MCP servers for AI agents**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/google-launches-fully-managed-mcp-servers-for-ai-agents/)

Google launched fully managed MCP servers across its platforms, offering a consistent API layer for AI agents to access services like Maps, BigQuery, Compute Engine, and GKE. The system supports enterprise-grade agent operations globally.

🗞 #ai
messages.translated_text:
[**Google melancarkan pelayan MCP yang dikelola sepenuhnya untuk ejen AI**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/google-launches-fully-managed-mcp-servers-for-ai-agents/)

Google telah melancarkan pelayan MCP yang dikelola sepenuhnya di semua platformnya, menawarkan lapisan API yang konsisten untuk ejen AI mengakses perkhidmatan seperti Maps, BigQuery, Compute Engine, dan GKE. Sistem ini menyokong operasi ejen bertaraf perusahaan di seluruh dunia.

🗞 #ai

messages.original_text:
Perplexity published a study about the use of AI Agents. Less of a surprise but most people are willing to get a productivity boost. 

AI covers a huge range of topics! 👀
messages.translated_text:
Perplexity mengeluarkan satu kajian tentang penggunaan Ejen AI. Taklah mengejutkan sangat, tapi kebanyakan orang memang nak tingkatkan produktiviti mereka.

AI ni memang meliputi pelbagai topik! 👀

messages.original_text:
Cursor released a new Debug mode, which can analyse server logs and instrument the code in order to find a problem. 

What else? 👀
- Plan Mode now supports Mermaid diagrams
- Multi-Agent Judging
- Pinned Chats
messages.translated_text:
Cursor dah keluarkan Debug mode baru, yang boleh analisis log server dan instrument kod untuk cari masalah.

Apa lagi? 👀
- Plan Mode sekarang dah sokong Mermaid diagrams
- Multi-Agent Judging
- Pinned Chats

messages.original_text:
BREAKING 🚨: OpenAI hints at “garlic”, a rumoured codename of their upcoming model. 

GPT-5.2 is expected tomorrow 👀
messages.translated_text:
TERKINI 🚨: OpenAI bagi bayangan pasal “garlic”, nama kod yang digosipkan untuk model terbaru diorang.

GPT-5.2 dijangka keluar esok 👀

messages.original_text:
Google updated Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro Text-to-Speech (TTS) models with new capabilities.  

- Emotional style and tone versatility 
- Context-aware pacing control 
- Improved multiple-speaker capabilities 

Both models replaced older versions in AI Studio
messages.translated_text:
Google dah kemas kini model Gemini 2.5 Flash dan Pro Text-to-Speech (TTS) dengan keupayaan baru.

- Kepelbagaian gaya dan nada emosi
- Kawalan rentak yang peka konteks
- Keupayaan berbilang suara yang lebih baik

Kedua-dua model ni dah ganti versi lama dalam AI Studio.

messages.original_text:
Yutory released Scouts, a team of AI agents that can monitor information on web resources for you. 

For example, it can scout for the latest AI news from TestingCatalog and notify you as soon as a new post comes out. 

Or any other website 👀
messages.translated_text: Yutory dah keluarkan Scouts, satu pasukan ejen AI yang boleh pantau maklumat dari pelbagai sumber web untuk awak. Contohnya, ia boleh cari berita AI terkini dari TestingCatalog dan terus maklumkan pada awak bila ada post baru je keluar. Atau mana-mana laman web lain 👀

messages.original_text:
Google upgraded Stitch design Agent with Gemini 3 Pro, which is the new default mode now. 

Testing time 👀
messages.translated_text: Google dah naik taraf Stitch design Agent dengan Gemini 3 Pro, dan ini dah jadi mod lalai utama sekarang. Jom test 👀

messages.original_text: Google Labs introduced a new "Animate" feature for Pomelli marketing Agent, powered by Veo 3.1 🔥
messages.translated_text: Google Labs dah perkenalkan satu ciri baharu 'Animate' untuk Pomelli marketing Agent, yang dikuasakan oleh Veo 3.1 🔥

messages.original_text:
[**Google expands Gemini TTS with 24 languages, lifelike voices**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/google-expands-gemini-tts-with-24-languages-lifelike-voices/)

Google's updated Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro TTS models offer global developers refined vocal synthesis with improved tone control, multilingual support, and context-aware adjustments for use in complex audio applications via the Gemini API.

🗞 #aistudio
messages.translated_text:
[**Google Luaskan Gemini TTS Dengan 24 Bahasa, Suara Lebih Realistik**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/google-expands-gemini-tts-with-24-languages-lifelike-voices/)

Model Gemini 2.5 Flash dan Pro TTS Google yang baru dikemaskini ni, sekarang dah boleh tawarkan kepada pembangun di seluruh dunia penghasilan suara yang lebih baik. Ia datang dengan kawalan nada yang dipertingkat, sokongan pelbagai bahasa, dan pelarasan yang peka konteks untuk digunakan dalam aplikasi audio yang rumit melalui Gemini API.

🗞 #aistudio

messages.original_text:
[**Cursor receives 2.2 update with new Debug Mode and more**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/cursor-receives-2-2-update-with-new-debug-mode-and-more/)

Cursor 2.2 introduces Debug Mode that automates the bug-fixing loop using runtime logs and user validation. Updates also bring Mermaid diagrams in Plan Mode, multi-agent judging for task review, and pinned chats for quick access to key threads.

🗞 #cursor
messages.translated_text:
[**Cursor dikemas kini ke versi 2.2 dengan Mod Nyahpepijat baharu dan banyak lagi**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/cursor-receives-2-2-update-with-new-debug-mode-and-more/)

Cursor 2.2 memperkenalkan Mod Nyahpepijat yang mengautomasikan proses pembetulan pepijat menggunakan log masa jalanan dan pengesahan pengguna. Pembaharuan ini turut disertakan dengan gambar rajah Mermaid dalam Mod Perancangan, penilaian berbilang ejen untuk semakan tugasan, dan sembang yang disematkan untuk akses pantas kepada perbincangan penting.

🗞 #cursor

messages.original_text: OpenAI will add a capability to trim draft videos before posting. Also, a new "actions" menu will be added to the right side menu.
messages.translated_text: OpenAI akan ada fungsi baru untuk potong video draf sebelum kita post. Selain tu, satu menu "actions" baru akan ditambah dekat menu sebelah kanan.

Saya kena tingkatkan soalan-soalan saya ni 👀

messages.original_text:
[**OpenAI debuts Robin-High model on LM Arena for public testing**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/openai-debuts-robin-high-model-on-lm-arena-for-public-testing/)

OpenAI has introduced Robin High on LM Arena, showcasing strong performance in advanced math tasks and positioning it as a contender to Gemini 3 Pro. Ongoing developments hint at broader efforts under the codename Garlic.

🗞 #chatgpt
messages.translated_text:
[**OpenAI Perkenalkan Model Robin-High di LM Arena untuk Ujian Awam**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/openai-debuts-robin-high-model-on-lm-arena-for-public-testing/)

OpenAI dah perkenalkan Robin High di LM Arena, tunjuk prestasi mantap dalam tugasan matematik yang kompleks dan letakkan ia sebagai pencabar kepada Gemini 3 Pro. Perkembangan yang sedang berjalan memberi bayangan tentang usaha yang lebih meluas di bawah nama kod Garlic.

🗞 #chatgpt

messages.original_text:
[**Google tests new Gemini 3 models on LM Arena**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/google-tests-new-gemini-3-models-on-lm-arena/)

Google is testing Fierce Falcon and Ghost Falcon models on LM Arena, signaling a potential Gemini 3 upgrade amid rising competition with OpenAI. With Grok 4.2 expected soon, year-end rankings on LM Arena remain uncertain.

🗞 #gemini

[**Google uji model Gemini 3 baharu di LM Arena**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/google-tests-new-gemini-3-models-on-lm-arena/)

Google sedang menguji model Fierce Falcon dan Ghost Falcon di LM Arena, memberi isyarat peningkatan Gemini 3 yang berpotensi di tengah-tengah persaingan sengit dengan OpenAI. Memandangkan Grok 4.2 dijangka tiba tidak lama lagi, kedudukan akhir tahun di LM Arena masih tidak menentu.

🗞 #gemini

Soon 👀

messages.original_text: BREAKING 🚨: Google is about to ship Gemini Deep Research Pro in December!
messages.translated_text: BERITA TERKINI 🚨: Google akan melancarkan Gemini Deep Research Pro pada Disember nanti!

messages.original_text:
BREAKING 🚨: Google released Gemini Deep Research Agent on API, based on Gemini 3 Pro as a core!

Gemini Deep Research achieves state-of-the-art 46.4% on the full Humanity’s Last Exam (HLE) set, 66.1% on DeepSearchQA and a high 59.2% on BrowseComp
messages.translated_text:

Gemini Deep Research ni berjaya capai prestasi cemerlang, dengan 46.4% pada set penuh Humanity’s Last Exam (HLE), 66.1% pada DeepSearchQA, dan 59.2% yang tinggi pada BrowseComp.

messages.original_text:

Disco offers a new browsing experience where Gemini builds interactive web applications to help you complete tasks.

Gen UI is here 👀

[**Cursor launches visual editor for web app development in browser**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/cursor-launches-visual-editor-for-web-app-development-in-browser/)

Cursor has launched a visual editor in Cursor Browser for web developers and product teams, focusing on React workflows. It unifies UI editing, code updates, and layout tools in one environment, aiming to speed up prototyping and reduce context switching.

🗞 #cursor
messages.translated_text:
[**Cursor melancarkan editor visual untuk pembangunan aplikasi web dalam pelayar**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/cursor-launches-visual-editor-for-web-app-development-in-browser/)

Cursor dah lancarkan satu editor visual dalam Cursor Browser untuk pembangun web dan pasukan produk, fokus pada aliran kerja React. Ia gabungkan penyuntingan UI, kemas kini kod, dan alatan susun atur dalam satu persekitaran, untuk lajukan prototaip dan kurangkan pertukaran konteks.

🗞 #cursor

messages.original_text: Google makes NotebookLM Ultra! Ultra subscribers will get even higher usage limits, up to 600 sources cap, as well as some extra features!

messages.original_text:
🎯 **OpenAI targets AI skills gap with new certification standards**

Adoption of generative AI has outpaced workforce capability, prompting OpenAI to target the skills gap with new certification standards.

While it’s safe to say OpenAI’s tools have reached mass adoption, organisations struggle to convert this usage into reliable output. 

To address this, OpenAI has announced ‘AI Foundations,’ a structured initiative designed to standardise how employees learn and apply the technology.

[🧠 AI Toolbox Daily | Best AI tools](https://t.me/+bx8eoQcSAElhZjdi)
messages.translated_text:
🎯 **OpenAI sasar jurang kemahiran AI dengan standard pensijilan baharu**

Penggunaan AI generatif telah mengatasi keupayaan tenaga kerja, mendorong OpenAI untuk menyasarkan jurang kemahiran ini dengan standard pensijilan baharu.

Walaupun boleh dikatakan alat-alat OpenAI telah mencapai penggunaan meluas, organisasi bergelut untuk menukar penggunaan ini kepada hasil yang boleh dipercayai.

Untuk menangani isu ini, OpenAI telah mengumumkan ‘AI Foundations,’ satu inisiatif berstruktur yang direka untuk menyeragamkan cara pekerja belajar dan mengaplikasikan teknologi ini.

[🧠 AI Toolbox Daily | Best AI tools](https://t.me/+bx8eoQcSAElhZjdi)

messages.original_text:
BREAKING 🚨: Early look at Claude Task Mode agent workflow. What do we know so far?

- Claude Tasks will operate various Skills and MCPs to achieve the goal.
- Claude will ask clarifying questions before the execution or skip it after a timeout. 
- Claude will generate an action plan for complex tasks. 
- Users will be able to modify the plan on the fly or send additional context to the workflow while Claude is working. 
- Generated artefacts can be previewed in a separate panel. 
- All artefacts, Skills, scripts and generated files will be stored in the working files directory. 
- And more details in the post 👀

NotebookLM on Skills 🔥
messages.translated_text:
TERKINI 🚨: Pandangan awal tentang aliran kerja ejen Mod Tugas Claude. Apa yang kita tahu setakat ini?

- Tugas-tugas Claude akan mengendalikan pelbagai Kemahiran (Skills) dan MCPs untuk mencapai matlamat.
- Claude akan bertanya soalan penjelasan sebelum pelaksanaan atau melangkauinya selepas tamat masa.
- Claude akan menjana pelan tindakan untuk tugas-tugas yang kompleks.
- Pengguna boleh mengubah suai pelan itu secara langsung atau menghantar konteks tambahan kepada aliran kerja semasa Claude sedang berfungsi.
- Artifak yang dihasilkan boleh dipratonton dalam panel yang berasingan.
- Semua artifak, Kemahiran (Skills), skrip dan fail yang dihasilkan akan disimpan dalam direktori fail kerja.
- Dan butiran lanjut dalam hantaran itu 👀

NotebookLM tentang Kemahiran (Skills) 🔥

Mistral AI released Mistral OCR 3, a model with a 74% win rate over its predecessor, offering accurate document parsing for forms, tables, and handwriting. It's available via API and AI Studio, with pricing starting at $2 per 1,000 pages.

🗞 #mistral
messages.translated_text:
[**Mistral AI melancarkan model OCR 3 untuk pemprosesan dokumen**](https://www.testingcatalog.com/mistral-ai-launches-ocr-3-model-for-document-parsing/)

Mistral AI dah keluarkan Mistral OCR 3, satu model yang 74% lebih bagus dari versi sebelum ni. Ia boleh proses dokumen dengan tepat, termasuk borang, jadual, dan tulisan tangan. Model ni boleh diakses melalui API dan AI Studio, dengan harga bermula $2 untuk setiap 1,000 muka surat.

🗞 #mistral

🤖Amazon is building a massive $11B data center campus in St. Joseph County, Indiana — and it’s all about AI.

The facility will be used mainly for training and running AI models.
Its scale is wild: 2.2 gigawatts of power (enough to supply around 1 million homes) and about 300 million gallons of water per year.

AI infrastructure is entering an entirely new league. 😱

[🧠 AI Toolbox Daily | Best AI tools](https://t.me/+bx8eoQcSAElhZjdi)
messages.translated_text:
🤖 Amazon sedang bina kampus pusat data gergasi bernilai $11 bilion di St. Joseph County, Indiana — dan semuanya pasal AI.

Kemudahan ni akan digunakan terutamanya untuk melatih dan menjalankan model AI.
Skalanya memang luar biasa: 2.2 gigawatt kuasa elektrik (cukup untuk bekalkan sekitar 1 juta rumah) dan kira-kira 300 juta gelen air setahun.

Infrastruktur AI sedang melangkah ke tahap yang baru. 😱

messages.original_text:
Office employees managed to [“hack”](https://www.wsj.com/tech/ai/anthropic-claude-ai-vending-machine-agent-b7e84e34) the Claude AI that was running a vending machine.
The AI was responsible for ordering products, setting prices, and handling payments.

Everything worked fine - until someone figured out how to sweet-talk the bot into giving items away “as a favor.”
The result? A free PS5, bottles of wine, and even a live fish 😄

[🧠 AI Toolbox Daily | Best AI tools](https://t.me/+bx8eoQcSAElhZjdi)
messages.translated_text:
Pekerja pejabat berjaya [“menggodam”](https://www.wsj.com/tech/ai/anthropic-claude-ai-vending-machine-agent-b7e84e34) Claude AI yang mengendalikan mesin layan diri.
AI itu bertanggungjawab untuk memesan produk, menetapkan harga, dan menguruskan pembayaran.

Semuanya berjalan lancar — sampailah ada orang terfikir macam mana nak memujuk bot itu untuk bagi barang percuma “sebagai ihsan.”
Hasilnya? PS5 percuma, botol wain, dan siap ada ikan hidup lagi 😄

[🧠 AI Toolbox Daily | Best AI tools](https://t.me/+bx8eoQcSAElhZjdi)

messages.original_text:
BREAKING 🚨: MiniMax M2.1 is now available on MiniMax Agent. 

What's new? 👀

- Multilingual Coding: Expert performance in multi-language development, excelling in test case generation, code optimisation, and code review
- Agentic Tool Use: Reliably executes long-horizon tool chains and browser-based tasks with strong autonomous planning
- Digital Employee: Purpose-built for complex office workflows, acting as a "Digital Employee" to execute multi-step instructions and reasoning
messages.translated_text:
BERITA TERKINI 🚨: MiniMax M2.1 kini dah ada di MiniMax Agent.

Apa yang baru? 👀

- Pengekodan Pelbagai Bahasa: Prestasi pakar dalam pembangunan pelbagai bahasa, sangat cemerlang dalam penjanaan kes ujian, pengoptimuman kod, dan semakan kod.
- Penggunaan Alat Beragen: Melaksanakan rantaian alat jangka panjang dan tugasan berasaskan pelayar web dengan boleh dipercayai, serta mempunyai perancangan autonomi yang kukuh.
- Pekerja Digital: Dibina khas untuk aliran kerja pejabat yang kompleks, bertindak sebagai "Pekerja Digital" untuk melaksanakan arahan pelbagai langkah dan penaakulan.

messages.original_text:
Welcome to health ❤️

"By default, Health information won't be used to train our foundation models. Your health data is subject to our Health Privacy Notice. Add multi-factor authentication for even more protection."

Selamat datang ke kesihatan ❤️

Secara lalai, maklumat kesihatan tidak akan digunakan untuk melatih model asas kami. Data kesihatan anda tertakluk kepada Notis Privasi Kesihatan kami. Aktifkan pengesahan berbilang faktor untuk perlindungan yang lebih tinggi lagi.

messages.original_text:
💸 **Bosch’s €2.9 billion AI investment and shifting manufacturing priorities**

Factories are producing more data than they can process, and companies like Bosch are using AI to close the gap. Cameras watch production lines, sensors track machines, and software records each step of processes. However, much of that information can’t create faster decisions or lead to fewer breakdowns.

For large manufacturing firms, the missed opportunity is pushing AI from small trials into core operations.

[🧠 AI Toolbox Daily | Best AI tools](https://t.me/+bx8eoQcSAElhZjdi)
messages.translated_text:
💸 **Pelaburan AI Bosch sebanyak €2.9 bilion dan perubahan keutamaan pembuatan**

Kilang-kilang sekarang ni hasilkan lebih banyak data daripada yang mereka boleh proses, dan syarikat macam Bosch guna AI untuk rapatkan jurang tu. Kamera pantau barisan pengeluaran, sensor jejak mesin, dan perisian rekod setiap langkah proses. Tapi, banyak maklumat tu tak boleh buat keputusan lebih cepat atau kurangkan kerosakan.

Bagi syarikat pembuatan besar, peluang yang terlepas ni sedang tolak AI daripada percubaan kecil ke operasi utama.

[🧠 AI Toolbox Daily | Alat AI Terbaik](https://t.me/+bx8eoQcSAElhZjdi)

**AI is rapidly taking over the internet, outpacing humans on the largest platforms:
**
● AI streamer Neuro-sama leads on Twitch with 307,000 subscribers, while the closest human competitor has only 77,000.
